"Just a second, I'm powering up my long-range antenna. It hasn't been used
=
in a while, still running the standard startup tests," said Celeron.

Scree=
ns blinked on inside the lab and red led's flashed all over the wall.
Celer=
on started typing on the keyboard at the center of the array.

"Ready..... =
scanning......." announced Celeron. "I'm reading two groups near
Relay.   I=
nteresting.... it looks like the Maximal base there has been
reactivated.  =
Either the Silver Wings have returned, or Perseus and his band
of Pasifist =
wimps have moved off the island.

"The other group, is inside relay.  Looks=
 like a mix of Maximal and Predecon
signatures.  I don't recognise the indi=
vidual transponder codes."

Meanwhile, in Relay...

The giant dog predecon =
had been consealed in the shadows behind the entrance
of the dark governmen=
t building.  That consealment was all it needed to get
the jump on them and=
 now its jaws were wraped around Ravenchief's throat.

Depthcharge opened f=
ired on the Predecon, with two shots landing directly in
its side.  It yelp=
ed in pain as the energy blasts exposed metal, and it
jumped to the side.

=
"Of all the luck...cough cough," said Ravenchief, leaping back and drawing
=
his weapon.

"You know this one?" asked Depthcharge.

"Yeah, this is the cr=
azy Pred that swam all the way out to Atlantis and took
all of us on at onc=
e," explained Ravenlchief.  "And when we first
encountered him, he attacked=
 us, then started attacking Hydras.  He's just a
homicidal maniac."

The Pr=
edecon transformed, shoulder and arm mounted cannons locking into
place.

"=
Dieeeeeeeeee!" he shouted, firing at both of them.
